title: Change Target Price
body: During the migration process, a large number of users purchased YamV2 at a high price, causing many users to rapidly shrink their assets after the first rebase. I propose that the community revise the target price to ETH/USDT to reduce the loss of existing users and attract more funds to join.
author: 0x954F1D97aE9c4a27d012e70cCaAfde29822B3F2B
